Recommended Cocktails

Fast builds with short looping clips so you can see the pour and texture.

🍋 Citrus ⚡ Electro

Lime Electro Collins

Vodka collins with a saline edge. Built to stay bright over ice.

  • 30ml vodka, tall glass of ice
  • 1 sachet Lime Electro Punch + top with soda
  • Roll once, garnish with lime wheels
🍓 Berry 🍾 Spritz

Cosmo Spritz

Soda, gin and the Cosmo sachet keep this light, not syrupy.

  • 30ml gin + ice in a wine glass
  • 1 sachet Cosmo + soda + splash lemonade
  • Garnish with frozen berries
🌴 Tropical 🍍 Pineapple

Pina Night Freeze

Frozen rum slushy that still hits protein + electrolytes.

  • Blend rum, ice, splash pineapple
  • Add 1 sachet Pina Colada and blend smooth
  • Top with mint + mango chunks

Recipes & Benefits

How to use Procktails and why we built it this way.

How to mix a Procktails cocktail

  1. Pick your base. Vodka soda, gin & tonic, rum + soda, hard seltzer - anything light and cold.
  2. Add one sachet. Tip in a full Procktails sachet and stir or shake until it's dissolved.
  3. Finish the drink. Add ice and garnish - lime wedges, berries, herbs - and adjust with extra soda if needed.
  4. Repeat. Same ritual, different flavour, same functional twist.

Quick recipes

  • Lime Electro Vodka: Vodka, soda, 1x Lime Electro Punch, ice, lime wedge.
  • Berry Gin Spritz: Gin, soda + splash lemonade, 1x Cosmo sachet, frozen berries.
  • Tropical Rum Freeze: White rum, pineapple juice, crushed ice, 1x Pina Colada sachet, blended.

Why Procktails?

  • Protein in the glass, not just the shaker. 15g per sachet to support recovery when your social life and training schedule clash.
  • Electrolytes for the long haul. Sodium, potassium and magnesium to help replace what you're sweating out.
  • Low sugar, no heavy mixers. Light flavour that sits on top of spirits instead of drowning them in syrup.
  • Built for people who still care tomorrow. Not a cure or a "health hack" - just a smarter way to drink when you're already going out.

How it works

Pick flavour Add spirit + ice Shake Pour & enjoy

Procktails doesn't cancel out alcohol and isn't a medical product. It sits between gym culture and nightlife. You still need water, sleep, food and common sense. Always drink responsibly.

Shipping, FAQ & Allergens

Quick answers for people who want the details.

Shipping

  • Domestic: 3-5 business days with tracking.
  • Express: 1-2 business days (metro areas).
  • Returns: Unopened sachets within 30 days.

Allergens & Nutrition

  • Contains milk (whey isolate). No soy or gluten added.
  • ~10g protein per sachet, low sugar, light electrolytes.
  • Not a medical product. Drink responsibly.

FAQ

  • How many per drink? One sachet per serve.
  • Mixing? Dissolve in cold soda/tonic, then add ice.
  • Storage? Cool, dry place. No refrigeration needed.
